claim: Cloud Atlas is adapted from a novel by David Mitchell.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Adapted from the 2004 novel of the same name by David Mitchell , the film has multiple plots set across six different eras , which Mitchell described as `` a sort of pointillist mosaic . ''
